search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for inFlow Inventory (inflow-inventory.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for inFlow Inventory is: [https://www.inflowinventory.com/software/pricing](https://www.inflowinventory.com/software/pricing) .
